    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_422bee7c2336afcef7a8d297722c1ca32388e232</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection in liquids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektion in den Flüssigkeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Convection dans les liquides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Convection nos líquidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Convezione in liquidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά στα υγρά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Convección en líquidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations compare the forces acting on a small volume of liquid at room temperature (top) and during heating (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen vergleichen die Kräfte, die 
auf einem kleinen Datenträger Flüssigkeit bei der Raumtemperatur 
fungieren (ober) und während der Heizung (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations comparent les forces agissant 
sur un petit volume de liquide à la température ambiante 
(supérieure) et pendant le chauffage (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações comparam as forças que agem 
em um volume pequeno do líquido na temperatura de quarto (superior) e
durante o heating (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni confrontano le forze che si 
comportano su un piccolo volume di liquido alla temperatura ambiente 
(superiore) e durante il heating (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις συγκρίνουν τις δυνάμεις 
ενεργώντας σε μια μικρή ένταση του ήχου του υγρού στη 
θερμοκρασία δωματίου (κορυφή) και κατά τη διάρκεια της θέρμανσης
(κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones comparan las fuerzas que 
actúan en un volumen pequeño de líquido en la temperatura ambiente 
(superior) y durante la calefacción (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chauffage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">liquides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
